titles.title: A concurrent resolution paying tribute to the Africa-America Institute for its more than 50 years of dedicated service, nurturing and unleashing the productive capacities of knowledgeable, capable, and effective African leaders through education.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 7/26/2005--Introduced. Pays tribute to the Africa-America Institute (AAI) for its more than 50 years of service, through education, in nurturing and unleashing the productive capacities of African leaders. Embraces AAI's mission and supports its work. Urges Members of Congress and others to join AAI's "Education Partnership Campaign: 50,000 New Leaders in Five Years."
